abilities.name: Rook's Gambit
abilities.description: Take 2 stress to roll your best action rating while performing a different action. Say how you adapt your skill to this use.

abilities.name: Cloak & Dagger
abilities.description: When you use a disguise or other form of covert misdirection, you get +1d to rolls to confuse or deflect suspicion. When you throw off your disguise, the resulting surprise gives you the initiative in the situation.

abilities.name: Ghost Voice
abilities.description: You know the secret method to interact with a ghost or demon as if it was a normal human, regardless of how wild or feral it appears. You gain potency when communicating with the supernatural.

abilities.name: Like Looking into a Mirror
abilities.description: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.

abilities.id: a little something on the side
abilities.name: A Little Something on the Side
abilities.description: At the end of each downtime phase, you earn +2 stash.

abilities.name: Mesmerism
abilities.description: When you Sway someone, you may cause them to forget that it's happened until they next interact with you.

abilities.name: Subterfuge
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from suspicion or persuasion, or to push yourself for subterfuge.

abilities.name: Trust in Me
abilities.description: You get +1d vs. a target with whom you have an intimate relationship.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.
